title: Paladins Digital Deluxe Edition 2022
description:
Experience the best way to play Paladins!

The Paladins Deluxe Edition 2022 includes the latest Season Pass as well as instant access to 40 Champions!
longDescription:
The Paladins Deluxe Edition 2022 includes the latest Season Pass, all content from the Starter and Gold Editions, and 10 extra Champions!

You’ll have instant access to a roster of 40 characters and instantly unlock the newest 2022 Champions upon their release!

Plus: You’ll get Exclusive content for new Champions, all year long! Get every new Season Pass Limited Skin, Unlocked Talents, Emotes, MVP Poses, and more for every new Champion released!

Best of all, you’ll instantly unlock cosmetics you can only get in the Season Pass: The Limited Jurassic Ying Skin and Dino Dash Mount.

As a special bonus, you’ll also receive 2,100 Crystals -- a $22 value! Unlock the newest Event Pass, a favorite Skin, or an Event bundle -- the choice is yours!

You'll also receive a 10% bonus on any Crystal purchases you make all year long!

12 Damage Champions: Bomb King, Dredge, Drogoz, Imani, Kinessa, Lian, Sha Lin, Strix, Tiberius, Tyra, Vivian, and Willo

8 Support Champions: Corvus, Furia, Grohk, Grover, Io, Mal'Damba, Pip, and Ying

10 Flank Champions: Androxus, Buck, Evie, Koga, Maeve, Moji, Skye, Talus, Vora, and Zhin

10 Frontline Champions: Ash, Atlas, Barik, Fernando, Inara, Khan, Makoa, Raum, Terminus, and Torvald

This Edition offers you the best value!

Please note that this Edition contains all content included in the Starter and Gold Editions as well as the latest Season Pass DLC.
